snippet: The Yankees’ bullpen, featuring Rafael Soriano, appears to have remained armed and dangerous despite being without the storied Mariano Rivera for the first time in 15 years.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Baseball column says the New York Yankees bullpen, featuring closer Rafael Soriano, appears to have remained armed and dangerous despite being without the storied Mariano Rivera for the first time in 15 years.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ bullpen, featuring Rafael Soriano, appears to have remained armed and dangerous despite being without the storied Mariano Rivera for the first time in 15 years.

headline.seo: Soriano Fills an Empty Chair in Yankees’ Bullpen
headline.main: Soriano Fills Empty Chair in Yankees’ Bullpen
headline.print_headline: Soriano Fills Empty Chair In Yankees’ Bullpen
